title: My pixel completely shut down the moment i insert in carging cable and I'm sure it was abouve 15%
content: My pixel completely shut down the moment i insert in carging cable,i'm damn sure it was about 15% remaing and it's been 4 days now phone is completely blaked out no charging sign ( on full night charge ) not going into boot ( after presseng and holding power and volume down key for 20 seconds ) not vibrating ( by holding power button , it may be on power saving mode) not ringing ( so not a display problem ) tried charging it with 3.5 Amps charger but it doesn't showed any responce, so is there any other thing which i should try?
